PAD_Approach.synopsis: A player encounters a dead bird.

PAD_Approach_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Approach_0.text: A dead bird. What happened to it?
PAD_Approach_0.context: NodeContext: Reacting to coming across a dead bird in the shadow-cursed lands.

PAD_Approach_1.speaker: Player
PAD_Approach_1.text: That dead bird's been corrupted by the shadows. Would be wise to leave it alone...
PAD_Approach_1.context: NodeContext: Reacting to coming across a dead bird in the shadow-cursed lands. Recognised it succumbed to the darkness in the region.
